If Democrats ever retake the United States Senate, the filibuster is gone anyway.

Republicans like John Cornyn refuse to fight. 

Refuse to use power. 

Refuse to do the very thing voters sent them to Washington to do: win.

You don‚Äôt save the Republic by protecting Senate traditions while the other side burns them down. You save it by acting. By codifying the America First agenda into law now, while we still can.

Texas didn‚Äôt send a Senator to Washington to manage decline. 

We sent one to stop it.

If you won‚Äôt fight when it matters most, step aside. Texas is ready for leadership that will.

New Podcast out Today:

üëâ They Had ONE Bullet Left - Inside the Beltway Sniper Arrest (Exclusive Firsthand Account)

Most people think the Beltway Sniper case ended with a dramatic takedown. It did not.

It ended at a quiet rest stop with two officers, a split-second decision, and one detail that still haunts the on-scene commander: the last bullet ‚Äútwirling‚Ä¶ and the tinkle on pavement.‚Äù

Retired Maryland State Police Lt. Dave @ReichenbaughC was there when John Allen Muhammad and Lee Boyd Malvo were captured. In this episode, he breaks down what the headlines missed:

-The Fed vs. state vs. local friction that changed the play
-Why the public was not ‚Äúpanicking,‚Äù they were the missing asset
-When forensics confirmed it was one gun, and why that made it worse
-The tarot card that shattered the terrorism theory: ‚ÄúCall me God‚Äù
-Why the safest move sounded backwards: do not rush in

This is not a recap. It is the firsthand account from the person standing at the edge of the decision.

Listen on your favorite podcast platform or watch on YouTube - search ‚ÄúHeroes Behind the Badge Podcast.‚Äù
